As a researcher in the ICCL lab, I have written papers about DNN HW/SW Co-Design, PIM architectures and Fully-Homomorphic-Encryption. I am currently working on computing systems and algorithms for Fully-Homomorphic-Encryptions. My research statement is to revolutionize secure computing with Homomorphic Encryption.
